results.title: The role of sodium lauryl sulfate on formulation of directly compressed tablets containing simvastatin and aspirin: Effect on drugs dissolution and gastric mucosa
results.text_hl: In this study, the effect of surfactant; @CHEMICAL_Sodium_Dodecyl_Sulfate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D012967 @@@sodium lauryl sulfate@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Sodium_Dodecyl_Sulfate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D012967 @@@SLS@@@), in enhancing the in vitro dissolution of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@) and ASA, as well as @<m>DISEASE_Stomach_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013272 @@@gastric irritation and@@@ upset, was studied.

citations.NLM: Alshora DH, Ibrahim MA, Zayed G, Al Rwashed MA, Abou-Taleb HA, Ali MF. The role of sodium lauryl sulfate on formulation of directly compressed tablets containing simvastatin and aspirin: Effect on drugs dissolution and gastric mucosa Saudi Pharm J. 2022 May;30(5):635-645. PMID: 35693440

results.title: Protective Effects of Simvastatin Against Alendronate-Induced Gastric Mucosal Injury in Rats.

results.title: [The effects of the cholesterol synthesis inhibitor simvastatin in patients with hypercholesterolemia with and without diabetes mellitus].
results.text_hl: One @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ discontinued therapy because of @<m>DISEASE_Stomach_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013272 @@@stomach@@@ complaints.

citations.NLM: van Deursen RT, Nieuwenhuijzen Kruseman AC, Degenaar CP, Wolffenbuttel BH. [The effects of the cholesterol synthesis inhibitor simvastatin in patients with hypercholesterolemia with and without diabetes mellitus]. Ned Tijdschr Geneeskd. 1990 Nov 3;134(44):2142-6. PMID: 2247172

results.title: Gastroprotective effect of simvastatin against indomethacin-induced gastric ulcer in rats: role of nitric oxide and prostaglandins.
results.text_hl: The stomachs tissues were used for determination of gastric mucosal @CHEMICAL_Lipid_Peroxides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008054 @@@lipid peroxides@@@, superoxide dismutase, @GENE_CAT @GENE_24248 @@@catalase@@@, total @CHEMICAL_Nitrites @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009573 @@@nitrites@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Dinoprostone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D015232 @@@prostaglandin E(2)@@@ levels. Pretreatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (10 mg/kg, orally, for 2 weeks) caused significant reduction in @<m>DISEASE_Stomach_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013272 @@@gastric mucosal lesions@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Lipid_Peroxides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008054 @@@lipid peroxides@@@ associated with a significant increase in gastric juice @GENE_SLC13A2 @GENE_65202 @@@mucin@@@ concentration.

citations.NLM: Heeba GH, Hassan MK, Amin RS. Gastroprotective effect of simvastatin against indomethacin-induced gastric ulcer in rats: role of nitric oxide and prostaglandins. Eur J Pharmacol. 2009 Apr 1;607(1-3):188-93. PMID: 19217901
citations.BibTeX: @article{19217901, title={Gastroprotective effect of simvastatin against indomethacin-induced gastric ulcer in rats: role of nitric oxide and prostaglandins.}, author={Heeba GH and Hassan MK and Amin RS}, journal={Eur J Pharmacol}, volume={607}, number={1-3}, pages={188-93}}

results.title: Effects of propionic acid and pravastatin on HMG-CoA reductase activity in relation to forestomach lesions in the rat.
results.text_hl: Several lipophilic 3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl coenzyme A (HMG-CoA) reductase inhibitors such as @CHEMICAL_Lovastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008148 @@@lovastatin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ produce @<m>DISEASE_Stomach_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013272 @@@forestomach lesions@@@ similar to @CHEMICAL_propionic_acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:C029658 @@@propionic acid@@@ after oral administration and the degree of alterations is correlated with their in vitro inhibitory potency (Kloss et al. 1991).

citations.NLM: Bueld JE, Bannenberg G, Netter KJ. Effects of propionic acid and pravastatin on HMG-CoA reductase activity in relation to forestomach lesions in the rat. Pharmacol Toxicol. 1996 Apr;78(4):229-34. PMID: 8861780
citations.BibTeX: @article{8861780, title={Effects of propionic acid and pravastatin on HMG-CoA reductase activity in relation to forestomach lesions in the rat.}, author={Bueld JE and Bannenberg G and Netter KJ}, journal={Pharmacol Toxicol}, volume={78}, number={4}, pages={229-34}}
